name: backend

scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix ../frontend install && npm --prefix ../frontend run build && mkdir -p ./public/client && cp -r ../frontend/dist/* ./public/client/
scripts.build:admin: npm --prefix ../frontend-admin/vite-admin install && npm --prefix ../frontend-admin/vite-admin run build && mkdir -p ./public/admin && cp -r ../frontend-admin/vite-admin/dist/* ./public/admin/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin

description: Backend Node.js pour Recettes de Cuisine
